title: Weekly Product Pulse: Key User Feedback & App Performance (Nov 3-9, 2025)
overview: For Nov 3-9, 2025, user feedback highlights critical app stability and financial trust issues. Primary concerns include severe performance glitches causing financial losses, high and opaque fees, and declining UI/UX quality post-updates.

themes.name: Glitches
themes.summary: Negative sentiment surrounds critical app malfunctions, including freezing, duplicate orders, and data inaccuracies, directly causing user financial losses.

themes.name: Fees & Financial Concerns
themes.summary: Users express strong dissatisfaction with high, increasing, and non-transparent charges, reporting unexpected deductions that erode investments.

themes.name: UI/UX
themes.summary: While easy for beginners, recent updates have degraded interface quality, introduced device optimization issues, and left the visual design feeling outdated.

quotes: In intraday when we booked profit it's hangs and buffer and goes profit into loss.
Money is cut without any reason, this is a very wrong system.
update but not for good, but for degradation. Extreme decrease in indicators.
actions: Prioritize a dedicated sprint to address critical app performance bugs, focusing on freezing, order execution, and data accuracy to prevent financial losses.
Conduct a comprehensive review of the fee structure, enhancing transparency and clearly communicating all charges to users.
Initiate user research to understand specific pain points regarding post-update UI degradation and outdated design, planning iterative improvements.
